PreceptDef.label: revered
PreceptDef.description: Succubi are sacred, and the pleasures they bring are divine.

PreceptDef.label: honored
PreceptDef.description: Succubi are good to have around. The benefits and pleasures they bring are worth the costs they extract.

PreceptDef.label: undesirable
PreceptDef.description: Succubi are ultimately not worth the trouble they bring with them.

PreceptDef.label: abhorrent
PreceptDef.description: Succubi are monstrous, and must not be permitted in our communities.
